    • Method Detail

      • check

        public boolean check()
              throws SynetNotFoundException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     ParseException,
                     RenderException
        Check if the given labeled transition system is synthesizable by Synet.
        Returns:
        true if synthesizable.
        Throws:
        SynetNotFoundException - Thrown if synet cannot be started
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an error occurs while reading synet's output
        ParseException - Thrown if the synet output can't be parsed.
        RenderException - Thrown if the input lts cannot be represented in the synet format.

      • getDisString

        private java.lang.String getDisString()
        Creates a String with locations out of the Apt-format into Synet-format.
        Returns:
        Location String in .dis-format.

      • getPN

        public PetriNet getPN()
        Returns a petrinet which is synthesized out of an location file and an labeled transition system by Synet.
